ing: 2 tablespoons butter or trans fat-free margarine
1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
des: "Here's a quick way to transform plain squash into a tasty dish full of antioxidants, including curry powder's curcumin - it's anti-cancer and protects your brain."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine first six ingredients. Microwave on high until heated through, about 5 minutes. Sprinkle on coconut, if desired. Serve.
